content: Is there a way to bless Miri's tests? I tried ./miri test --bless, which gave a Cargo error, and ./miri test --test compiletest -- --bless, which ran no tests and did nothing.
I just realized the failing tests were run-pass tests. I moved them to compile-fail now, but --bless still doesn't work.
no there isnt, unfortunately. our compile-fail tests use //~ annotations for which I dont think there is bless support anywhere
our run-pass tests check stdout and stderr but almost all tests output nothing, its just about not having an interpretation error, so there was no push for ever implementing bless support there
